snippet: In a blistering speech, President Obama denounced the Republican Party for cruelty and extremism and signaled a tough-minded campaign ahead.
abstract: Editorial applauds Pres Obama for denouncing Republicans and their presidential candidates for embracing the House budget plan, which Obama denounces as hurtful to low- and middle-income Americans; notes this is the first time Obama has linked Mitt Romney by name to his party's dishonest budget and discredited trickled-down policies, signalling Obama's willingness to wage a tough-minded campaign.
lead_paragraph: In a blistering speech, President Obama denounced the Republican Party for cruelty and extremism and signaled a tough-minded campaign ahead.
